page_content:
Carbon60 Limited (Formally s.com Group Limited)

Carbon60 Defence Services

Carbon60 works with Defence customers in the CIS/C4ISTAR/C4ISR arena. We develop CONEMPS, CONOPS, Concepts and Doctrine and deliver Information Management, ICT/CIS infrastructure, communications and software solutions via remote or embedded Helpdesk, Service Desk and Technical Guidance and Support ( 1st/2nd/3rd line) to Maritime, Air and Land environments.

Features

  • Enabling MOD front-line commands to procure easy-to-use, secure solutions.
  • Extensive knowledge of C4ISTAR and C4ISR requirements.
  • Communications Information Systems (CIS), Command, Control, Communications, Computers (C4).
  • Intelligence, Surveillance, Target Acquisition, Reconnaissance (ISTAR)/Security Assurance.
  • Maritime, Land and Air experience.
  • High Grade Military Messaging and Communications/Information Security.
  • Information Security, Cyber Security and Information Assurance.
  • CIS Security, Information Assurance, Secure Logistics and Database Management
  • Secure Video Conferencing and Telecomms knowledge
  • Specialist niche expertise (eg Oracle OBIEE/remote Command System Support)

Benefits

  • Independence. Truly independent advisors, with no affiliation to product suppliers.
  • Breadth. Delivering support to Maritime, Air and Land Frontline Commands.
  • Operational Knowledge. Extensive MOD fixed/deployable CIS and C4ISTAR experience.
  • Requirements Based. Can develop systems IAW Information Exchange Requirements (IER).
  • Innovative. Security Consulting/Assurance services protect Client’s Cloud-based business model.
  • Worldwide. UK/overseas coverage – technical experts CONDO accredited where necessary.
  • Flexible. Independent Information Security advice through network of CLAS Consultants.
  • Comprehensive. Information Security, IA, IT Health Checks and testing services.
  • Experienced. 35+ years’ experience handling sensitive data in MOD/OGD.
  • Partnership. Active partnership programme enables value added collaborative approach.

Pricing

£250 to £1125 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Day
